name: Nichibutsu Collection 2
overview: Nichibutsu Collection 2 is the second compilation of two Nichibutsu/Nihon Bussan games that had previously been released on the Super Famicom. It follows Nichibutsu Collection 1, released the previous month, and is distinct from the Nichibutsu Arcade Classics duo. Nichibutsu Collection 2 features the following two games: Super Gomoku Shogi (1994): A game that combines shogi and the Go variant Gomoku. Mahjong Hanjouki (1995): A mahjong game.
